title: Asian Stocks Open Higher After US Gains, Oil Rises: Markets Wrap
description: Asian equities opened higher after US jobs data helped push stocks to new highs on Friday. Oil climbed as protests in Iran intensified.
content: Asian equities opened higher after US jobs data helped push stocks to new highs on Friday. Oil climbed as protests in Iran intensified.
